articles.description: We estimate that manufacturings share of GDP will rise to 21 per cent by 2031 implying an incremental 1 trillion manufacturing opportunity
articles.content: India has the conditions in place for an economic boom fueled by offshoring, investment in manufacturing, the energy transition, and the country's advanced digital infrastructure, Morgan Stanley said… [+2950 chars]
